original_text:
and the earth will respond to the grain,
    the new wine and the olive oil,
    and they will respond to Jezreel.
korean_text: 땅은 곡식과 포도주와 기름에 응답하고 또 이것들은 이스르엘에 응답하리라

sentences.original_text: and the earth will respond to the grain
the new wine and the olive oil
and they will respond to Jezreel
